title.rendered: “The interactive sessions helped me a lot to clear my concepts” – Ajitesh Choudhary

content.rendered:
Digiperformer Ajitesh Choudhary is passionate about knowledge. He believes that one should learn something new every day. He says “It isn’t money which motivates us –having a sense of purpose motivates. Learning new skills makes you better-rounded so you can more easily find what you love to do.” Choosing Digital marketing certification was yet another learning experience for Ajitesh. Readout her journey in her own words!  

It’s a pleasure to connect with you! Before heading further, we would like to know a bit about you.

I’m Ajitesh. I have a keen interest in learning about something new whenever I get the chance.   

What originally attracted you to choose digital marketing as your career?

Digital Marketing is one such field where you have to be creative as well as logical. The mixture of both really intrigued me and I decided to pursue Digital Marketing.   

What exactly makes us stand out from the competition & urge you to choose us over others?

Digiperform is one such training program where the course enhances our skills as well as our personality. The interactive classes helped me to clear my concepts and supportive faculties helped me to understand the subject on a deeper level.    

Tell us about your favorite experience you had with us, whether as a learner or as a customer?

As a learner, I really liked the way the faculties always encouraged us to be the best version of ourselves.  

Would you consider Digiperform as a trusted & reliable resource for Digital marketing training? Why?

Yes. I would definitely recommend anyone to join Digiperform.   

If you were to review our training program, what score would you give it out of 10?

I would for sure give it a 10.  

Where do you see yourself in the next 5 years?

Whatever is going to happen in 5 years will depend on how I spend my time today. So I’m just focusing on my present and giving my best.  

If you had a piece of advice to someone just starting out, what would it be?

Take risks. Get out of the comfort zone and keep making learning.   

Finally, Describe Digiperform in one line.

Nothing but Amazing.
